title: Wonderfull app!
comment: Started using it yesterday at work and it works great for my type of projects! One thing i would love is to have an option to always show the notification (even if no timer is active). That would be awesome together with Lama!

title: Not safe
comment: I used this app for a month or two.  Before few days it crashed and didn't start anymore. I reinstalled it and all records are gone. Now I have no idea how much hours to report at work. I'm in trouble now. I thought that automatic backup saving is "must to have" in such an  app.  In addition all time reports are in the same list, it's not so comfortable.

Didi you register for an online account through the app? Otherwise you could just login again and all of your time registrations should be back.
I tested the upgrade schema extensively so I wonder what might have gone wrong in your case. You are the only one reporting a crash upon upgrading the app..

title: The best app for tracking TIME.
comment: I used to wonder where have I spent my time., but now I can keep track of my time.

title: Great app!
comment: This is the most useful time tracking app. The design is sleek, simple and modern and makes tracking work time really easy.
Simple and good, but lacks a summary of time spent on each task and project. It can be currently done after exporting timesheet.
